The five kinds of sensual stimulation [m: Sights known by the eye that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing
Sounds known by the ear that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing
Smells known by the nose that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing
Tastes known by the tongue that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing
Touches known by the body that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing
The hierarchy of splendor [mn80:17.3]: A beryl gem that was naturally beautiful, eight-faceted, well-worked
A firefly in the dark of night
An oil lamp in the dark of night
A bonfire in the dark of night
The Morning Star in a clear and cloudless sky at the crack of dawn
The full moon at midnight in a clear and cloudless sky on the fifteenth day sabbath
The sun at midday in a clear and cloudless sky in the last month of the rainy season
The statement of some ascetics and brahm: “Rebirth is ended, the spiritual journey has been completed, what had to be done has been done, there is no return to any state of existence.”
